documents.efficacy_summary: 本护发素配方具有强效调理作用，并提供热保护特性，有效减少热造型对头发的损伤。配方易于生产，可一步完成，使头发柔顺易梳理，同时增强头发的健康光泽。

efficacy_summary_meta.reasoning: 基于产品名称'Conditioner with Heat Protecting Properties'和描述'Strong conditioning formula.'生成。

function_meta.reasoning: Water (Aqua)通常用作溶剂。
Glycerin是常见的保湿剂。
Behentrimonium Chloride是常用的阳离子表面活性剂，主要用作调理剂。
Silicone Quaternium-22是一种硅酮季铵盐，主要用作调理剂。
Cetearyl Alcohol是常用的乳化剂和增稠剂。

phases.note: 将所有原料加入水中，加热至75°C并充分搅拌混合均匀，注意阳离子原料需缓慢加入避免结块

function_meta.reasoning: Citric Acid常用于调节pH值。
Perfume是香精香料。
Preservative是防腐剂。

phases.note: 冷却至40°C以下后加入香精和防腐剂，避免高温导致香精挥发或防腐剂失效

process.description:
Add all ingredients to water and heat up to 75°C with adequate mixing.
Homogenize at 75°C.
Cool down while stirring.
Add perfume and preservative below 40°C.
Adjust pH to 4.5-5.5.

documents.formula_reasoning:
该配方设计合理，采用一步法工艺简化生产流程，降低生产成本。
主要优点：
1. 使用阳离子调理剂提供优异的调理效果
2. 硅油成分提供热保护功能，有效减少热造型损伤
3. 配方pH值适中(4.5-5.5)，与头发等电点接近，有利于毛鳞片闭合
4. 工艺简单，一步法完成，适合规模化生产
扣分项：配方中缺少植物提取物等天然成分卖点。
documents.core_advantages: 热保护功能，减少热造型损伤；一步法工艺，生产简便；强效调理，柔顺易梳；增强头发光泽

target_area_meta.original_text: Personal care applications including color cosmetic, sun care and hair care

documents.efficacy_summary: DOWSIL FA 4002 ID Silicone Acrylate是一种成膜剂，能与有机防晒剂、颜料和化妆品成分良好兼容。它在彩妆中作为添加剂，能提供舒适持久的底妆，使口红具有长效、不沾杯和舒适的特性。该产品具有耐洗、耐皮脂和减少皮脂的功效，同时不堵塞毛孔，并能提供有弹性的柔韧定型效果。

efficacy_summary_meta.original_text:
Film former
Compatibility with organic sunscreens, pigments and cosmetic ingredients
Additive in color cosmetics
Durable foundation with comfort to wear
Lipstick with long lasting, non-transfer and comfort properties
Wash off resistance
Sebum resistance and reduction
Non-occlusive
Flexible hold with bounce

process.description:
This is a low viscosity fluid that is easily incorporated into a variety of personal care formulations.
When heat is used, the material should be processed in an enclosed vessel to prevent the isododecane from volatilizing; the vessel should be inerted at temperatures over 40°C (104°F).
process.notes: Isododecane may cause skin irritation upon repeated and prolonged exposures. Proper dilution of this product into consumer personal care end products is recommended.

documents.efficacy_summary: 本配方是一款理想的轻薄防晒产品，提供SPF 30的防晒保护。其独特的质地轻薄、清爽、不油腻、不发粘，同时具有优良的稳定性。配方中的UV吸收剂对肤感几乎没有影响，确保了舒适的使用体验。作为日用保湿霜，它在防晒的同时也提供保湿功效。

efficacy_summary_meta.reasoning: 基于配方文档中的“理想的轻薄防晒产品”、“防晒产品质地轻薄，清爽，不油腻和不发粘”、“Emulium Mellifera 的配方中UV吸收剂对于肤感几乎没有影响”等描述进行总结。

process.description:
1. Mix all the ingredients in Part A and heat to 80℃
2. Mix the Butylene Glycol and SpecThem XTG200 in Part B and stir well
3. Add the remaining ingredients of SpecThem SCB21 in Part B to step two. After stirring evenly, sprinkle SpecThem SCB21 evenly on the liquid level, heat it to 80°C, and keep it warm for later use.
4. Mix PrzvFree 4HAP and water (partial), heat to 80°C, and keep it insulated for later use.
5. Add step 1 to step 3 and homogenize until the system is homogeneous
6. Stir and cool down below 45°C, add Part C, step 4 and ParbFree PE91 to step five, and stir until the system is uniform.

documents.efficacy_summary: PolluFree洗发水是一款温和低刺激的氨基酸洗发水，能产生丰富的泡沫，有效清洁秀发。配方中添加菊苣根调理剂，赋予头发柔软的冲洗感和服帖柔滑的干后体验。莫诺依A.O.精油的加入，对头发具有修复作用，同时显著提高头发的光泽。这款洗发水绿色环保，不含聚季铵盐，不会对水体造成污染，易于冲洗，有助于节约用水。

efficacy_summary_meta.reasoning: 基于配方描述、市场故事和关键原料信息综合生成
efficacy_summary_meta.original_text:
· 温和低刺激氨基酸表活，丰富的泡沫
· 菊苣根调理剂赋予头发柔软的冲洗感，服帖柔滑的干后体验感
· 莫诺依A.O.的加入对头发有修复作用，同时提高头发的光泽
绿色环保氨基酸洗发水，不含聚季铵盐，不会对水体造成污染，同时易冲洗，也可节约用水。

usage_method_meta.original_text: An easy water rinse makes this audacious break disappear as a magic wand.

documents.efficacy_summary: 这款创意染发霜具有多功能性，可用于头发和身体，为头发带来红色效果，或在身体上形成短暂的纹身。SEPIMAX ZEN是理想的聚合物，可悬浮、稳定和分散珠光，并与10%乙醇具有良好的兼容性。EMOSMART V21是关键成分，可提供独特的轻盈不粘腻触感，同时使乳霜焕发光泽并易于涂抹，无需使用硅酮。BIOEXTENDER SPE富含矿物质，为头发提供硫氨基酸，使发丝更强韧，抵抗日常侵害，保持柔顺。SEPICAP MP作为热活性多重保护剂，可对抗氧化应激的有害影响，保护发干和发根的完整性，并抚平毛鳞片。

efficacy_summary_meta.reasoning: 根据产品描述和关键成分的功效进行总结。
efficacy_summary_meta.original_text: This creative colouring cream is multifunctional. The BnH, Body and Hair cream, makes your Hair and Body fun with red hair and/or an ephemeral tattoo on body! An easy water rinse makes this audacious break disappear as a magic wand. SEPIMAX™ ZEN is the perfect polymer to suspend, stabilize and disperse mother-of-pearl. It has a good compatibility with 10% ethanol. EMOSMART™ V21 is the key ingredient to produce a distinctive light and non-sticky touch while making the cream glow and giving easy spreading without using silicone. BIOEXTENDER™ SPE: Red algae extract, rich in minerals, which brings sulfur amino acid to hair. The hair fiber is stronger and resists to daily agressions for a supple hair. SEPICAP™ MP: Thermo active multiprotector for stressed and sun-damaged hair, blow-drying, pollution or chemical treatments, biovector of amino acids and panthenol, SEPICAP™ MP contributes to combat the harmful effects of oxidative stress. It simultaneously protects the integrity of the hair shaft and root as well as it smoothes scales.

efficacy_tags_meta.reasoning: 根据产品名称“红色染霜”和功效描述中的“red hair”、“stronger”和“protects the integrity of the hair shaft”推断。

It is now possible to formulate transparent aqueous gels, cream-gels and emulsions with any kind of active ingredients and to achieve ZEN.

process.description: Add water into main kettle, then add Sepimax ZEN, homogenize it for 4 mins at 4000rpm, then stir it until it uniformly. Mix phase B in a side beaker until clear, then add phase C into it, mix it well. Then add phase B&C into main kettle, mix it uniformly. Add phase D, mix it uniformly.

phases.note: B相原料单独预处理，确保分散性

process.description:
To prepare Phase A, weigh all of the ethanol into an appropriate sized mixing vessel. Using an overhead mixer with a propeller blade, mix at 500 rpm and pull a vortex 3/4 of the way down the shaft. Slowly sift in the AMPHOMER EDGE polymer into the vortex. Once completely dispersed, weigh in the AMP-Ultra PC 1000 and allow to mix until solution is complete. Then add the remaining ingredients, one at a time, mixing thoroughly after each addition.
To prepare Phase B, filter concentrate, fill cans, and charge with propellant.

documents.efficacy_summary: 本产品为铜肽舒缓修护喷雾，具有强效急救和精准呵护的功效。能够有效舒缓皮肤刺激，提供即时修护，使肌肤焕亮弹润，宛若新生。配方中含有多种皮肤调理剂和保湿剂，旨在改善肌肤状态，提供全面的舒缓和修护。

process.description:
1. 混合Part A中各原料, 加热至 (80±5) ℃, 保温30分钟至料体均一, 备用。
2. 降温至 (70±5) ℃ 加入Part B混合至料体均一, 其中PrzyFree® 4HAP (热水预溶解), 搅拌直至完全溶解。
3. 降温至 (40±5) ℃ 加入 Part 中各原料 (香精用LRI 预先增溶透明)。
4. 搅拌均一至室温出料。

documents.efficacy_summary: 这款滋养面膜含有0.5%的Actigum CS11 QD I，一种通过生物发酵获得的硬葡聚糖增稠剂。它能为面膜精华液提供1000-1500 mPa.s的适宜粘度，确保面膜能很好地贴合面部，并带来极佳的感官体验。配方pH值在5.6-6.0之间，质地为朦胧水凝胶，通过了常温和45°C下2个月的稳定性测试。

efficacy_summary_meta.reasoning: 基于产品描述和特性信息生成
efficacy_summary_meta.original_text: Our nourishing face sheet mask has been created with 0.5% of Actigum CS11 QD I, a scleroglucan texturizer, that is obtained through biofermentation. Actigum CS11 QD I is responsible the right viscosity for the serum of the facial sheet mask, of 1000 – 1500 mPa.s. It ensures that the facial sheet mask nicely sticks to the face and leaves a great sensorial feeling. pH: 5.6-6.0 Viscosity: 1000 - 1500 mPa.s Appearance: Haze hydrogel Stability: passed 2 months stability at RT & T45°C

phases.note: 水相原料按顺序添加，充分搅拌溶解
B相原料单独预处理，确保分散性

process.description:
1. Add water into tank, add Actigum CS11QDI with stirring 300rpm, for one minute, then homogenize at 9000rpm for 10minutes.
2. Start to heat to 60°C.
3. Add the rest of phase A one by one, until uniform.
4. Stop heat and start cool process, when temperature reach 45°C, add phase B one by one, stirring at 500rpm until uniform.
5. Prepare phase C, mix together in clear liquid, add into tank with stirring at 500 rpm, until uniform.
6. Adjust the pH with Sodium hydroxide (10%) manually.
